name: Restructive
description:
Description

You are a kaiju just having some fun. A game about destroying and rebuilding. This is more of a sandbox- there is no strong goal to complete here.  (There is no ending currently)

Thanks for playing!

Here is an ending if you are looking for one:

Controls
  • [Arrow Keys] to Move!
  • [X] to Interact
  • [Space] to Jump
